>"How are we divvying it up?"
Give Vision the option to lay claim to a gem, at the very least, since he's been a little bit sour about it the past few times. Tatsu probably gets the other, and then we can all commiserate over how having a gem gives you the fucking nervous sweats.

We're obviously going to be interested in the Keystone if peoples' previous suggestions were any indication, but I'm not sure how to value it at first glance.

Crafters should have first claim on mats if they're interested, otherwise divide them up treating them as though they were currency. Weight Gems heaviest against the currency split, followed by armor/equip drops. Keystone is probably a quest item, but if it's a rare Key Item drop or something, weight it slightly higher than equipment but below Gems.

Whoever gets the Gilded Mail probably get the Armor Scraps too in order to facilitate repairs.
